authorAttribution.displayName: No Nombre Primero No Nombre Apellido

originalText.text: The Latina Branch Manager is very dumb and lazy. She walks around in her high heels to show off her shoes but does no work. I don't know how she became a branch manager? When she sees clients who need help, she'll always say, "I'll get someone to help you, " but no one comes and she comes back out after you've left ðŸ¤£

originalText.text: Went by today at 9:25 am.  Completely broke and did not have my bank card which would not serve any purpose because this branch on Delancey Street and Ludlow NYC had a big sign that read "temporarily closed"  No explanation as to why.  Needlesss to say I had to go back home.  I was on my way to work.  Now I have to look for another branch.  I looked online and it turns out that quite a few branches are temporarily closed.  Its odd.  Makes me suspicious.

originalText.text:
Professional and kind staff. Waiting line 20 minutes,only 1 window open. 1 teller working in the window, 3 persons walking inside the branch and watching how she works and supervising her?  I just can't understand,  how is that possible? They trying to send everyone to ATM, but if you need certified check, you can't get it from ATM. Please make an option to get certified check from ATM, and I will not bother tellers at all. But I think there is much more situations when you need teller and go to the window. There is also elderly people, who can't use ATM. Dear Management Please have at least 2 windows Open while busy hours, because it is not fun to spend 20 minutes in lane, when it takes only 3 minutes to get certified check.

5 stars given because staff provided professional services and lady was very kind.

For 20 minutes waiting in lane 0 Stars.

originalText.text: Bank is closed again and none of the ATM machines are working at this location. Very inconvenient for customers. This is the second time they have closed and it seems lack of staff or due to employees with COVID . I am thinking about switching to CHASE because the inconvenience is not working with me and I will prefer a more responsible branch that can work with my needs as a customer.
